description:
OVER 60 SUCCESSFUL STUDENTS HAVE ALREADY TAKEN THIS COURSE

NEW FEATURE! All Lessons include step by step in video instructions & RAW + PSD! Making it even easier for anyone to follow and learn photoshop retouching quickly!

YOU LOVE YOUR PET? AND WOULD LOVE TO RETOUCH YOUR LATEST IMAGE?

  • AND DO IT QUICK & EASY?
  • AND GET ALL DETAILS OUT OF IT?
  • AND WITH NO PROIR PHOTOSHOP KNOWLEDGE!

--------------------------- ” Then this course is for you ” -------------------------------

About this course:

  • Over 60 very happy students
  • Over 2 hours of Photoshop Lessons
  • No illustrator, or other software is needed - You only need Photoshop
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!
  • Now includes all raw & psd files which you can profit from - instantly

You will need no prior photoshop knowledge or any other programs - I'll show you how to instantly get into photoshop retouching and have fun with it. (literally!) In all photoshop lessons I go into full detail showing exactly how you, like me, can use these photoshop techniques & skills for immediate success. (You just need to know these simple photoshop steps)

Based on my huge successes, I let you look over my shoulder as I photoshop, showing you precisely what I do on an average 5 to 20 Min per lesson. Making photoshop fun and easy. "Anyone can do this"

For that reason I've even made my biggest Photoshop course for free here on Udemy. It covers over 150 free lectures and has become the most popular Photoshop course here on Udemy.

Whether you already have worked with photoshop before or not, you can be quickly earning good money from your photoshop knowledge from 30+- minutes work a day ... just like me! Maybe as a dog retoucher :)

I stress that you need no prior photoshop experience and there's nothing to buy or pay for. You Just need Photoshop!

You'll learn

  1. How to photograph an animal & set the light setup
  2. How to do Raw Conversions
  3. How to do Basic Retouching - Image Cleanups
  4. How to sharpen and enhance the image more
  5. How to do work & add a color background
  6. How to do Merge & Refine the Animals Shape and Hair
  7. How to do shape the animals features and give dimension with shadows
  8. How to apply color grades and fix color casts
  9. How to apply the dodge & burn technique
  10. How to apply the dodge & burn technique

... and much, much more!

So, you've read this far! Thank you.

As with all my courses:

  • the initial low price will increase shortly - Currently $45 Next $60
  • you have unlimited lifetime access at no extra costs, ever
  • all future additional lectures, bonuses, etc in this course are always free
  • there's an unconditional, never any questions asked full 30 day money-back-in-full guarantee
  • my help is always available to you if you get stuck or have a question - my support is legendary in Udemy

One final very important point.

If you have never worked in photoshop before, I spend a lot of time in this course showing you how to master photoshop, with no prior photoshop knowledge! Using my extensive knowledge which I crammed up in over 2 hours of photoshop tutorials!

You could be photoshopping any animal image by the end of today, right after going through this course - and even be making money with your new photoshop compositing knowledge immediately!

Click the "take this course" button, top right, now ... every hour you delay is costing you time & money ...

Manni
title: Photoshop Dog Retouching - All Tips & Tricks Covered
